attributes.action: Publish the information that SAGE uses to give COVID19 advice to the government
attributes.additional_details: This information is of public interest, besides the fact that it would allow for non-political institutions and scientists to independently peer-review the methods used by the alleged scientists of SAGE. This should be the basis for any kind of scientific argument and it is essential to ensure that the measures in place are justified by solid evidence. Furthermore, this is the main action that can be taken to fight the alleged misinformation on the internet that some MPs keep mentioning.
attributes.background: I want the government to make available all the data, information, and models in full detail, that have been used by the SAGE committee to provide advice to the government with regards to the measures taken during the COVID19 pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558595
